extendedInfo.description: Achieve success and track your goal progress with Goal Setting!  An app designed to help easily set and manage your goals and new year resolutions.If you're saving to buy a car, planning a diet, building an empire or simply want to kick a few bad habits then Goal Setting! can help.  It'll help you stay motivated and keep you on track.Goal Setting! has the following features:- Create and edit goals and resolutions- View goals by status and category- Choose between normal or numeric based goals- Record unlimited and value stamped notes- Save images against each goal to help you visualise and track progress- Choose a colour scheme for each goal- Manage your own list of units- much much more . . .

reviews.title: Keeps force closing
reviews.comment: Looks like an excellent app. Has what I need and categories I can edit to tailor to what I\'m trying to achieve. Cant keep it open long enough to do anything productive in it. Hoping for  an update soon. I\'d really like to use this.
reviews.author: Amber Fuller

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Best of its type on the market, has all the neccessary features required, hope that this app continues to be updated and improved
reviews.author: Dayne Conroy

reviews.comment: Looks awesome too bad I can\'t select numerical option. Page won\'t scroll down
reviews.author: sherry manez

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I have been looking for. A simple way to track my goals and attach notes and images to keep track. Will try for a couple of days before purchasing full version.
reviews.author: Josh Marsters
